name: Piece of Elementalist Gear
description: Contains a rare or exotic piece of level 78-80 gear for elementalists. Double-click to open.

name: Endless Mystery Cat Tonic
description: A faint, feline scent emanates from the bottle. Use its self-replenishing contents to transform into...something.

name: Piece of Guardian Gear
description: Contains a rare or exotic piece of level 78-80 gear for guardians. Double-click to open.

name: Piece of Warrior Gear
description: Contains a rare or exotic piece of level 78-80 gear for warriors. Double-click to open.

name: Huntsman Starter Kit
description: One-time account purchase. Double-click to open.

name: Toymaker Tixx's Gift
description: Double-click to open.

name: Chauncey von Snuffles III
description: Placed second in the Divinity's Reach Fanciest Cat competition. Double-click to summon. Only one miniature can be active.

name: Goedulf
description: Legendary wolf-cub spirit that protects lost norn kids. Double-click to summon. Only one miniature can be active.

name: Jeweler Starter Kit
description: One-time account purchase. Double-click to open.

name: Laureate Coin Booster
description: Double-click to gain an enhancement that increases your coins from kills by 30% for one hour.

name: Laureate Magic Find Booster
description: Double-click to gain an enhancement that gives an additional 30% Magic Find for one hour.

name: Plush Quaggan Backpack Cover
description: Double-click to imbue another back-slot item's stats into this appearance (one-time ability).

name: Piece of Mesmer Gear
description: Contains a rare or exotic piece of level 78-80 gear for mesmers. Double-click to open.

name: Artificer Starter Kit
description: One-time account purchase. Double-click to open.

name: Pristine Fractal Relic
description: Double-click to deposit 1 Pristine Fractal Relic in your wallet.

name: Lost Orrian Jewelry Box
description: Double-click to open.

name: Laureate Experience Booster
description: Double-click to gain an enhancement that grants an additional 30% experience from kills for one hour.

name: Leatherworker Starter Kit
description: One-time account purchase. Double-click to open.

name: Weaponsmith Starter Kit
description: One-time account purchase. Double-click to open.

name: Chef Starter Kit
description: One-time account purchase. Double-click to open.

name: Piece of Necromancer Gear
description: Contains a rare or exotic piece of level 78-80 gear for necromancers. Double-click to open.

name: Heavy Crafting Bag
description: Contains sixth-tier crafting materials. Double-click to open.

name: Piece of Thief Gear
description: Contains a rare or exotic piece of level 78-80 gear for thieves. Double-click to open.

name: Armorsmith Starter Kit
description: One-time account purchase. Double-click to open.

name: Mystic Binding Agent
description: Replaces Elonian wine in some Mystic Forge recipes involving slivers, fragments, shards, and cores.

name: Light Crafting Bag
description: Contains third-tier crafting materials. Double-click to open.

name: Large Crafting Bag
description: Contains fifth-tier crafting materials. Double-click to open.

name: Piece of Engineer Gear
description: Contains a rare or exotic piece of level 78-80 gear for engineers. Double-click to open.

name: Tiny Crafting Bag
description: Contains first-tier crafting materials. Double-click to open.

name: Refugee Memento
description: This item was of great importance to its owner. Family members may want it back. Volunteers at checkpoints and refugee camps can return it to the right people.

name: Sandford's Medallion
description: <c=@flavor>Said to be worn by the Traveler himself.</c>

name: Piece of Ranger Gear
description: Contains a rare or exotic piece of level 78-80 gear for rangers. Double-click to open.

name: Small Crafting Bag
description: Contains second-tier crafting materials. Double-click to open.

name: Fierceshot's Arrowhead
description: <c=@flavor>Said to have belonged to the legendary charr archer Pyre Fierceshot.</c>

name: Imperial Chef Yileng's Golden Spoon
description: <c=@flavor>The legendary chef gave these to his finest students.</c>

name: Consortium Charm
description:
Guaranteed* to protect against any of a multitude of threats and indignities!

*Guarantee not legally binding.

name: Armbrace of Truth
description: <c=@flavor>An ancient Elonian relic said to have once been extremely valuable.</c>

name: Jade Wind Orb
description: <c=@flavor>This relic of long-forgotten Cantha contains air captured from the Jade Winds.</c>
